title: Guimard Printing Plate, ca. 1900
inscribed:
Engraved on face of plate in reverse: Hector Guimard / Ancien Professeur a l'Ecole Nationale des Arts Décoratifs / Ancien Vice-Président de la Sté des Artistes Décorateurs / Ancien Vice-Président de la Sté des Architectes Moderns/
18,Rue Henri Heine.16 p. [at lower left corner]
description:
Slightly tarnished copper plate engraved with the name, professional affiliations and address of the French architect, Hector Guimard.

Includes possible original folder and envelope in which the plate was kept.

tombstone.epitaph:
Guimard Printing Plate, ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. Copper, black ink residue. Gift of Unknown Donor. 2003-1-1-a.
